title: In Defense of Rob Manfred
itunes:title: In Defense of Rob Manfred
description:
On today's edition of The Herd, Colin comes to defense of Rob Manfred during the ongoing crisis with Major League Baseball, why you shouldn't listen to the boycott crowd still surrounding Colin Kaepernick & starting to form around Chuba Hubbard, and why Tua Tagovailoa is further along than you might think!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
